Author: laptopfreek0
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Driiven - A simple cryptocurrency index fund
Body: Buy a basket of cryptocurrencies as easy as a cup of coffee.   Website | Whitepaper | Team & Advisers | Token  Twitter | Medium (Blog) | Reddit  What is HODL5?  HODL5 is a crypto index fund that is equally distributed among the top five cryptocurrencies. The holdings are rebalanced monthly, and it is designed to mimic the performance of the broader crypto market. It is designed in such a manor that every day users will be able to buy into the cryptocurrencies without having to research which coin to buy.  Backtesting the fund has produce a 9000% return, which is about 10 times the return of bitcoin over the same period!   What makes Driiven ICO Unique?  The ICO is being ran as a donation model, similar to kickstarter. All funds are donated to help us build out the fundâ€™s platform. For every 0.01 ETH, donated you will receive one beta access token. For the first two years, beta access tokens are required to purchase funds based upon the HODL5 index.  Additionally, we are offering a token buyback guarantee.   Team Members:  Tim Coy, CEO Jonathan Williams, CTO Jon Dickerson, Advisor Jack Bloom, Advisor   Quick Stats:  Country of Origin: USA Token Sale Start Date: 2018/03/01 Token Sale End Date: 2018/05/01 ICO price of token: 1 BAC (Beta Access Coin) / 0.01 ETH Whitepaper: https://www.driiven.com/static/whitepaper.pdf Blog: https://medium.com/@timothycoy Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/driiven Twitter: https://twitter.com/driivenfunds   Join our ICO Today! Together we can bring cryto investing to the mainstream.

Author: thegrey
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Driiven - A simple cryptocurrency index fund
Body: from the website: Quote HODL5-N Non-accredited investors  No minimum investment required  Launching on a state by state basis I read this as the project is limited to US citizens - is that correct?

Author: laptopfreek0
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Driiven - A simple cryptocurrency index fund
Body: The accredited fund will be setup as a hedge fund in order to get it out quickly. And then we are in talks with lawyers to have a second fund released that non-accredited investors will be able to buy into.

Author: laptopfreek0
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Driiven - A simple cryptocurrency index fund
Body: You do not need to be a US citizen to purchase the tokens; however, in order to use the tokens for the initial fund you must be a US citizen, unfortunately. In a later fund, we plan to make it more open.
